results.content: I learn how to use JQuery and AJAX working on a few project. The instructor explains topic clearly providing details and examples.
results.content_html: I learn how to use JQuery and AJAX working on a few project. The instructor explains topic clearly providing details and examples.

results.content: Nice course for beginners in js,jquery & ajax. No one can teach this much in 4 hours.if you have very limited time..it's best otherwise see other detailed courses.
results.content_html: Nice course for beginners in js,jquery & ajax. No one can teach this much in 4 hours.if you have very limited time..it's best otherwise see other detailed courses.

results.content:
Excellent, this course is complete with a lot of useful examples.
He knows what he is talking about.
The rhythm is perfect, not too fast not too slow.
Well explained, pleasant voice, I highly recommend.
results.content_html:

results.content: The course jumps around a little but if you are patient you will get the answers you needed.  I am now programming Ajax() like a pro and using it for work.  This class made me a MUCH better programmer and really opened my eyes to using modals and ajax! Thank you Eng Ali Mehdy, you are the man!
results.content_html: The course jumps around a little but if you are patient you will get the answers you needed. I am now programming Ajax() like a pro and using it for work. This class made me a MUCH better programmer and really opened my eyes to using modals and ajax! Thank you Eng Ali Mehdy, you are the man!

results.content: a lot of the videos end abruptly, and there is a section that says this is the old way of doing something that we supposedly are to ignore, but the code and information from this section is used throughout the rest of the slides that i have seen so far.
results.content_html: a lot of the videos end abruptly, and there is a section that says this is the old way of doing something that we supposedly are to ignore, but the code and information from this section is used throughout the rest of the slides that i have seen so far.

results.content: The course builds up confidence in doing projects and gives enough pointers to expand the logic. I would have loved this course if it had covered the usage of php in ajax json transactions.
results.content_html: The course builds up confidence in doing projects and gives enough pointers to expand the logic. I would have loved this course if it had covered the usage of php in ajax json transactions.

results.content: Its a good beginner course, I liked it. The instructor explains it in the simply way for beginners to grasp easier.

results.content: A very basic introduction to jquery, well covered!
